means: 封（港），禁止（船只）出入港口

sentence.Network_en: Britain was signalling its readiness to have the embargo lifted.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国表示愿意取消贸易禁令。

sentence.Network_en: The ship was impounded under the terms of the UN trade embargo.
sentence.Network_cn: 该船因触犯联合国贸易禁运条款而被扣押。

sentence.Network_en: The embargo won't hurt us because we're used to going without.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁运不会对我们有妨害，因为我们已经习惯了没有供应的日子。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 禁字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 禁欲〖 mortified;ascetic〗 禁运〖 embargo〗 禁止〖 inhibit〗.
英语词根 - 豆丁网 ... incise v. [切开,雕] 等等. embargo 禁止入港,禁止,阻碍 embark 乘船; 从事,著手.
英语词根 - 豆丁网 ... em 或 embargo n. [禁止入港], empirical a. [经验上的].
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... lingo 难懂的方言，隐语 embargo 禁运令，封港令 forgo 放弃，抛弃.

list.abs: ...略物资或急需的国内短缺物资进行严格控制的主要手段。贸易禁运（trade embargo）则是一些国家为了制裁其敌对国家而实行的贸 …
embankment 堤embargo list 禁运货单embargo policy 禁运政策
新词新译（W）_holy_新浪博客 ... 无农不稳 (There is) 武器禁运 arms embargo 武器输出国 arms exporter;arms-exporting country.
航海及海运专业术语O(1) ... oil eliminator 分油器 oil embargo 石油禁运 oil engine power plant 柴油机动力装置.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Spanish, from embargar 'arrest', based on Latin in- 'in, within' + barra 'a bar'

entry.def: If one country or group of countries imposes an embargo against another, it forbids trade with that country.

example.ex: The United Nations imposed an arms embargo against the country...
example.tran: 联合国对那个国家实施了武器禁运。

example.ex: He has called on the government to lift its embargo on trade with Vietnam.
example.tran: 他呼吁政府解除对越南的贸易禁运。

entry.def: If goods of a particular kind are embargoed, people are not allowed to import them from a particular country or export them to a particular country.

example.ex: They embargoed oil shipments to the US.
example.tran: 他们对美国实施石油禁运。

means.word_mean: 1. a government order imposing a trade barrier
1. ban the publication of (documents), as for security or copyright reasons;

auth_sentence.content: Clubs who breach those rules face a transfer embargo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clubs who breach those rules face a transfer embargo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clubs who breach those rules face a transfer embargo.

auth_sentence.content: Greece pressed for the delayed implementation of the embargo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Greece pressed for the delayed implementation of the embargo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Greece pressed for the delayed implementation of the embargo.

auth_sentence.content: It took a oil embargo to revise the status quo.
auth_sentence.res_content: It took a oil embargo to revise the status quo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It took a oil embargo to revise the status quo.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =weight,表示"重,压"; 2. 删栏; 3. =stick,表示"棒,栏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bar重,压+i+tone音调,音质→压下去的声音→男中音
baro=bar压力+meter计量→n.气压计,睛雨表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 条, 棒[常用作栅栏,扣栓物], 横木, 酒吧间, 栅, 障碍物
禁止出入港口, 禁运
stems_affixes.word_buile: em进入+bar棒,栏+go走→用栏拦住→禁运,禁止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 禁止[船只]出入港口, 禁运
stems_affixes.word_buile: em进入+bar棒,栏+go走→用栏拦住→禁运,禁止

Sentence.sentence: The embargo (禁运) created panic in the West and caused oil prices to shoot up.
Besides the sharp increase in oil prices, OPEC's 1973 oil embargo caused panic in the West
Over the years before the OPEC's embargo America had depended heavily on foreign oil/importing oil.

sentences.en: This country put an oil embargo on an enemy country.
sentences.cn: 该国对敌国实行石油禁运。

jushi.english: They've put an embargo on the supply of weapons to the small country.
jushi.chinese: 他们对这个小国实施武器禁运。

jushi.english: There have been calls to embargo all arms shipments to the region.
jushi.chinese: 曾有人呼吁禁止所有武器运往这个地区。
